channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report E-2023100703
item.description:
Report E-2023100703

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: SCOTT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES L
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 10, 2023, three (3) 5-gallon pails and five (5) one-gallon pails of paint (UN1263) were crushed during transit and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of paint to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from E3OMI to remediate the impacted site. The crew deployed absorbents to the release and utilized hand tools to collect all debris in four (4) 55-gallon drums for disposal by R+L.
